name: GET OUT - A ZX Spectrum Next Game
name_original: GET OUT - A ZX Spectrum Next Game
description:
===========================================================

A single player 3D Maze game for the ZX Spectrum Next based on 3D Monster Maze for the ZX81 but with no monster.

Primary purpose         : Single player Maze Game
Hardware Needed      : ZX Spectrum Next.
                                     : Tested on Core 3.01 and Next Basic 2.06H

===========================================================

Description            

You landed on a planet in a far away solar system and became a prisoner of the inhabitants. However, one day you find the place deserted of all life and so decide to GET OUT!

How to Play            

1 Use the arrow keys 5, 7 and 8 to move around the maze.
2 Find the switch to open the door.
3 Flip the switch by moving forward into it then find the door to leave the maze.
4 Head up to level 0 and leave this world in your Spaceship.

keys                   
Movement keys = 5, 7 and 8
View map key = 0
Exit the game to Basic = x

Also included is a separate Map Maker program so you can make your own maps and load in at the game start. Be careful to read the included documentation on making your own maps, esp on placing the Exit door and Switches.

This is my first proper machine code program. I hope you enjoy it.
